page.title: 03OUR SCHOOL UNIFORM
page.content: At school we have a{uniform}but we dont have to wear it.People that want to look smart just wear school colours green,grey and white.Girls that dont wear the school colours or uniform generally wear a skirt or dress,and the boys wear jogging suits, shorts and t_shirt.The girls uniform for winter is a green or grey skirt,white blouse,green jumper and a yellow and green tie.For{summer girls wear a white and green checked dress and cardigan.The boys summer uniform is grey shorts,white or grey shirt and tie.Some people wear blazers.In the{winter the boys wear black or grey trousers with a white or grey shirt and tie.We are not allowed to wear jeans or dangly earings.
